text: A Mini CD is the second and latest type of CD that is of smaller size, usually 8 cm, instead of 12 cm at the first CD type. Mini CD can hold less data, about 210 Megabytes, or 24 minutes of music. There is also a version which can only hold 155 MB of data, or 18 minutes of music. Mini CD and CD can also come in different sizes, such as a hart shape, a bussines cards,... that can hold between 10 MB and 100 MB of data that are called shaped CD (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shaped_compact_disc). Category:Compact Disc
title: Mini CD
